member.name: IHomeGroup.IsMember
member.summary: Determines whether the local computer is a member of a HomeGroup.
member.param: When this method returns successfully, receives TRUE if the local computer is a member of a HomeGroup; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IHomeGroup.ShowSharingWizard
member.summary: Displays a wizard that allows a user to create a Home Group, and then retrieves the sharing options that the user selected through the wizard.
member.param: Handle of the owner window of the wizard, used for notifications. This value can be NULL.

param.name: sharingchoices
param.para: Pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one or more of the following values that indicate the libraries and devices chosen through the wizard to be shared with the Home Group.
0x00000000. None of the Home Group options were selected
0x00000001. The Music library was selected to be shared with the Home Group.
0x00000002. The Pictures library was selected to be shared with the Home Group..
0x00000004. The Videos library was selected to be shared with the Home Group.
0x00000008. The Documents library was selected to be shared with the Home Group.
0x00000010. Installed printer devices were selected to be shared with the Home Group.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a standard error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The user canceled the wizard. Use to extract this error code.

The computer is not joined to a Home Group or the network or Home Group is not in a state that allows sharing (such as not being connected to the network or having another sharing operation in progress).
The method was launched from a multithreaded apartment (MTA) thread.

member.name: IHomeGroup
member.summary: Exposes methods that determine a computer's HomeGroup membership status and display the sharing wizard.
